name: Sacred Grove
description:
Beyond the trees that were never explored,

past the leaves that fell last fall,

lays a very large and very ancient forest.

A forest where the magic of old still rules

Where the trees whisper in the night

And the wind carries secrets long forgotten

For as long as life has been the forest has nourished it

Protecting this gift and sharing it with others

But as ancient things often do, the forest is dying...

Now it's your turn, young sprout.

Go on, delve into the forest and uncover its secrets.

But be careful, with the power of the forest vanishing, dangerous folks have found their way into the forest.

So prepare yourself youngster, to fight, to discover and to become a hero in this top down adventure game!
